TEXT.TITLE: <KIDSTON GOLD MINES LTD> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY:
Shr 48.4 cents vs 40.6
    Yr div 37 cents vs 15
    Net 60.50 mln dlrs vs 50.76 mln
    Turnover 134.54 mln vs 100.63 mln
